additionalInformation: Bracer automatically upgrades on the 25th-minute mark. For Turbo Mode, it automatically upgrades on the 12th-minute mark.
For Turbo Mode, it automatically upgrades on the 12th-minute mark.

The item's attributes grant the following bonuses: 110/220 health and 0.5/1 health regeneration. 24/48 mana and 0.1/0.2 mana regeneration. 2/4 attack speed and 0.33/0.67 main armor. 5/10 main attack damage to heroes, 2/4 main attack damage to / heroes, and 6/12 main attack damage to heroes.
5/10 main attack damage to heroes, 2/4 main attack damage to / heroes, and 6/12 main attack damage to heroes.
name: Bracer
description: The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.
tips: For most non-strength heroes, it grants as much attack damage as a Wraith Band or Null Talisman.
